item.description:
Friday, June 5th, We'll be doing it again.
Anthony's of Malden
105 Canal St. Malden
8pm to at least 1 am (maybe 2 AM, depending on the crowd)
$10 per person

We had over 200 people at the last one and this one is looking great.
Right now the ratio of men to women is at 50/50 which is fantastic.

I'll be using my experience from the May dance to make this one even better, and any suggestions are always considered.

*Upstairs Ballroom * Quiet Side Room * Hot & cold hor's douevres * Big Dance Floor *

Nice casual dress will be allowed,
But no jeans / Sneakers / Hats / T-shirts / Work Boots.
item.how_to_find_us: You can't miss me, hopefully I'll be on the dance floor.
item.name: Looking good singles dance!
